description: I. Letter dated 02/04/2009 from Hazel Blears MP to Paul Goodman MP regarding funding to support local authority work to prevent violent extremism. 5 p. II. Letter dated 17/03/2009 from Hazel Blears MP to Michael Martin MP, Speaker, following up a point of order raised by Paul Goodman MP on responses to correspondence about funding to prevent violent extremism. 7 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
